properties.body:
HYDROARC 160/25(19,96).
BERING SEA.
NORTH PACIFIC.
KAMCHATKA.
DNC 13, DNC 24.
1. EARTHQUAKE WITH PRELIMINARY MAGNITUDE OF
   7.8 OCCURRED AT 181858Z SEP. TSUNAMI WAVES ARE
   POSSIBLE FOR COASTS LOCATED IN AREA WITHIN 870 MILES
   OF 53-00.00N 160-48.00E. TSUNAMI MAY BE A SERIES OF WAVES
   WHICH COULD BE DANGEROUS FOR SEVERAL HOURS AFTER THE
   INITIAL WAVE ARRIVAL.
2. TSUNAMI ACTIVITY IS FORECASTED TO START AT
   THE FOLLOWING TIMES:
   A. PETROPAVLOVSK 53-12.00N 159-36.00E AT 1930Z.
   B. UST KAMCHATSK 56-06.00N 162-36.00E AT 1938Z.
   C. MEDNNY ISLAND 54-42.00N 167-24.00E AT 2002Z.
   D. OSTROV KARAGINS 58-48.00N 164-30.00E AT 2006Z.
   E. SHEMYA 52-43.45 N 174-07.13 E AT 2120Z.
   F . NAWILIWILI 22-00.00N 159-24.00W AT 0051Z.
   G. HONOLULU 21-18.00N 157-54.00W AT 0105Z.
   H. KAHULUI 20-54.00N 156-30.00W AT 0111Z.
   I. HILO 19-42.00N 155-06.00W AT 0129Z.
3. TSUNAMI WAVES REACHING THREE METERS ABOVE
   THE TIDE LEVEL ARE POSSIBLE AND MAY BE
   A SERIES OF WAVES WHICH COULD BE DANGEROUS
   FOR SEVERAL HOURS AFTER THE INITIAL WAVE ARRIVAL.
4. FURTHER TSUNAMI INFORMATION CAN BE FOUND
   AT WWW.TSUNAMI.GOV.
